Package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.item

Class Item

java.lang.Object
me.itzloghotxd.pdk.item.Item
public class Item extends Object
Utility class for creating and modifying ItemStack instances with custom properties such as names, lore, enchantments, attributes, and persistent data.
Author:
ItzLoghotXD

      Creates an ItemStack with a specified material, name, and lore.
      Parameters:
      material - The material of the item.
      name - The display name of the item.
      lore - The lore of the item (nullable).
      Returns:

    • addItem

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack addItem​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.Material material, @NotNull @NotNull String name, @Nullable @Nullable List<String> lore, boolean glow)
      Creates an ItemStack with a specified material, name, lore, and optional glowing effect.
      Parameters:
      material - The material of the item.
      name - The display name of the item.
      lore - The lore of the item (nullable).
      glow - Whether the item should have a glowing effect.
      Returns:
      The created ItemStack.

    • addItem

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack addItem​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.Material material, @NotNull @NotNull String name, @Nullable @Nullable List<String> lore, @Nullable @Nullable Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> enchantments, @Nullable @Nullable Map<org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute,​org.bukkit.attribute.AttributeModifier> attributes, @Nullable @Nullable List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemFlag> flags)
      Creates an ItemStack with enchantments, attributes, and flags.
      Parameters:
      material - The material of the item.
      name - The display name of the item.
      lore - The lore of the item (nullable).
      enchantments - The enchantments to apply (nullable).
      attributes - The attributes to apply (nullable).
      flags - The item flags to apply (nullable).
      Returns:
      The created ItemStack.

      Parameters:

      The created ItemStack.
